lcn.p: An Initiate is a Jedi in the earliest formal stage of training. In the ideal setting, where Jedi start their training at very young ages, Initiates tend to be children, in which case they are often referred to as "Younglings".

An Initiate trains in the Jedi discipline in the most sheltered context that their school has the practical ability to provide. It is as an Initiate that one learns the basics of the Jedi Discipline. This includes, but is not limited to, learning how to construct the tools that Jedi of that school are expected to know how to construct.
